io/

readparam.pro


top source readparam

I/O

result = readparam(filename)

Reads in a parameter file containing "key = value" pairs.

Return value

Returns a structure that has one element for each line in the file. The first character of the file specifies the type: a for string, b for boolean, i or n for integer, and d for double. # is a comment character.

Parameters

filename in

Name of parameter file.

Examples

FIXME REQUIRES: Craig Markwardt's hashtable object (http://www.physics.wisc.edu/~craigm/idl/down/hashtable__define.pro).
